info.description: This API exposes Azure Log Analytics query capabilities
info.title: Azure Log Analytics

200.description: OK. The API call succeeded and the metadata result is in the response payload

get.description: Retrieve the metadata information for the workspace, including its schema, functions, workspace info, categories etc.

200.description: OK. The API call succeeded and the metadata result is in the response payload

post.description: Retrieve the metadata information for the workspace, including its schema, functions, workspace info, categories etc.

200.description: OK. The API call succeeded and the Analytics query result is in the response payload

get.description: Executes an Analytics query for data

200.description: OK. The API call succeeded and the Analytics query result is in the response payload

post.description: Executes an Analytics query for data. [Here](https://dev.loganalytics.io/documentation/Using-the-API) is an example for using POST with an Analytics query.

requestBody.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

queryParam.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)
queryParam.name: query

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group to get. The name is case insensitive.
resourceGroupName.name: resourceGroupName

subscriptionId.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
subscriptionId.name: subscriptionId

timespanParam.description: Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value.  This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.
timespanParam.name: timespan

workspaceName.description: Name of the Log Analytics workspace.
workspaceName.name: workspaceName

type.description: The data type of this column.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties that can be provided on the error details object

resources.description: Indicates resources which were responsible for the error.

target.description: Indicates which property in the request is responsible for the error.

value.description: Indicates which value in 'target' is responsible for the error.

additionalProperties.description: Additional properties that can be provided on the error info object

innererror.description: Inner error details if they exist.

errorInfo.title: The code and message for an error.

errorResponse.description: Contains details when the response code indicates an error.
errorResponse.title: Error details.

metadataApplication.description: Application Insights apps that were part of the metadata request and that the user has access to.

id.description: The ID of the Application Insights app.

name.description: The name of the Application Insights app.

region.description: The Azure region of the Application Insights app.

related.description: The related metadata items for the Application Insights app.

functions.description: The related functions for the Application Insights app.

tables.description: The related tables for the Application Insights app.

resourceId.description: The ARM resource ID of the Application Insights app.

metadataApplication.title: An Application Insights application.

metadataCategory.description: Categories are used to group other metadata entities.

displayName.description: The display name of the category

related.description: The related metadata items for the category

functions.description: The functions related to the category

queries.description: The saved queries related to the category

resourceTypes.description: The resource types related to the category

solutions.description: The Log Analytics solutions related to the category

tables.description: The tables related to the category

metadataCategory.title: A metadata category.

metadataFunction.description: Functions are stored Kusto queries that can be specified as part of queries by using their name.

parameters.description: The parameters/arguments of the function, if any.

tags.description: The tags associated with the function.

body.description: The KQL body of the function.

displayName.description: The display name of the function.

name.description: The name of the function, to be used in queries.

related.description: The related metadata items for the function.

categories.description: The related categories for the function.

resourceTypes.description: The related resource types for the function.

solutions.description: The related Log Analytics solutions for the function.

tables.description: The related tables for the function.

workspaces.description: The related workspaces for the function.

metadataFunction.title: A stored function.

metadataPermissions.description: Permission information for the metadata call, includes apps/workspaces/resource the user didn't have access to.

applications.description: The permission indication for the Application Insights apps on the metadata request.

resourceId.description: The resource ID on the permission indication.

resources.description: The permission indication for the Azure resources on the metadata request.

denyTables.description: The list of tables that were denied access for the resource ID.

resourceId.description: The resource ID on the permission indication.

workspaces.description: The permission indication for the workspaces on the metadata request.

denyTables.description: The list of tables that were denied access for the resource ID.

resourceId.description: The resource ID on the permission indication.

metadataPermissions.title: Permission information.

metadataQuery.description: Queries are stored pieces of KQL, along with a list of relevant metadata items.

tags.description: The tags associated with the query.

body.description: The KQL body of the query.

displayName.description: The display name of the query.

labels.description: The user defined labels associated with the query.

related.description: The related metadata items for the query.

categories.description: The related categories for the query.

resourceTypes.description: The related resource types for the query.

solutions.description: The related Log Analytics solutions for the query.

tables.description: The related tables for the query.

metadataResource.description: Azure resources that were part of the metadata request and that the user has access to.

metadataResourceType.description: Metadata about types of Azure resources, containing relevant tables, functions, etc.

tags.description: The tags associated with the resource-type

displayName.description: The display name of the resource-type

labels.description: The user-defined labels of the resource-type

related.description: The related metadata items for the resource-type

categories.description: The categories related to the resource-type

functions.description: The functions related to the resource-type

queries.description: The queries related to the resource-type

tables.description: The tables related to the resource-type

metadataResourceType.title: A type of resource in Azure.

metadataResults.description: The metadata response for the app, including available tables, etc.

applications.description: The list of Application Insights apps that were referenced in the metadata request.

categories.description: The list of categories that are referenced in this metadata response.

functions.description: The list of functions stored on the workspace, or introduced by solutions etc.

permissions.description: The list of permission rules that affected the metadata request.

queries.description: The list of saved queries stored on the workspace, or introduced by solutions, resource types, etc.

resourceTypes.description: The list of resource types that are referenced in this metadata response.

resources.description: The list of Azure resources that were referenced in the metadata request.

tables.description: The list of tables and columns that comprise the schema of the workspace.

workspaces.description: The list of Log Analytics workspaces that were referenced in the metadata request.

metadataSolution.description: Solutions can group tables and functions that are associated with a certain Azure Log Analytics offering.

tags.description: The tags that are associated with the Log Analytics solution

description.description: The description of the Log Analytics solution

displayName.description: The display name of the Log Analytics solution

id.description: The ID of the Log Analytics solution

name.description: The name of the Log Analytics solution

properties.description: The properties of the Log Analytics solution

related.description: The related metadata items for the Log Analytics solution

categories.description: The categories related to the Log Analytics solution

functions.description: The functions related to the Log Analytics solution

workspaces.description: The Workspaces referenced in the metadata request that are related to the Log Analytics solution

metadataTable.description: Tables are part of the workspace schema, and contain a list of columns and a reference to other relevant metadata items.

tags.description: The tags associated with the table

columns.description: The list of columns defined on the table

isPreferredFacet.description: A flag indicating this column is a preferred facet

source.description: an indication of the source of the column, used only when multiple workspaces have conflicting definition for the column

type.description: The data type of the column

labels.description: The user defined labels of the table

related.description: The related metadata items for the table

categories.description: The related categories for the table

functions.description: The related functions for the table

queries.description: The related saved queries for the table

resourceTypes.description: The related resource types for the table

solutions.description: The related Log Analytics solutions for the table

workspaces.description: The related Log Analytics workspaces for the table

timespanColumn.description: The column associated with the timespan query parameter for the table

metadataTable.title: A data table that takes part in a workspace schema.

metadataWorkspace.description: Log Analytics workspaces that were part of the metadata request and that the user has access to.

id.description: The ID of the Log Analytics workspace.

name.description: The name of the Log Analytics workspace.

region.description: The Azure region of the Log Analytics workspace.

related.description: The related metadata items for the Log Analytics workspace.

functions.description: The related functions for the Log Analytics workspace.

queryBody.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

timespan.description: Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value.  This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.

workspaces.description: A list of workspaces that are included in the query.

queryParam.description: The Analytics query. Learn more about the [Analytics query syntax](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/app-insights-analytics-reference/)

queryResults.description: Contains the tables, columns & rows resulting from a query.

tables.description: The list of tables, columns and rows.

queryResults.title: A query response.

table.description: Contains the columns and rows for one table in a query response.

columns.description: The list of columns in this table.

rows.description: The resulting rows from this query.

table.title: A query response table.

timespanParam.description: Optional. The timespan over which to query data. This is an ISO8601 time period value.  This timespan is applied in addition to any that are specified in the query expression.

workspacesParam.description: Workspace IDs to include in cross-workspace queries.
